    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Account
    Represents a user account with a username and password.
    AccountManager
    A utility class for managing the currently logged-in account.
    AccountStorage
    A utility class for storing and retrieving a list of Account objects to and from a JSON file located in the user's operating system-specific application data directory.
    Bestenliste
    Eine Bestenliste zur Verwaltung von Spielerpunkteständen.
    BestenlisteEintrag
    Repräsentiert einen einzelnen Eintrag in der Bestenliste.
    Bot
    Handles bot behavior based on difficulty.
    CardDTO
    A Date Transfer Object (DTO) representing a playing card.
    ChatComponent
    A simple chat UI component using Swing.
    ChatNachricht
    Represents a chat message with a sender and message content.
    Chatservice
    Remote interface for chat-related functionalities.
    ChatserviceImpl
     
    client
    JavaFX app. client application entry point for Cosmic Eidex.
    CreateController
    Controller class for creating a new game room.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of cards for the Eidex game.
    DeleteController
    Controller for deleting user accounts.
    DTOConverter
    Utility class for converting domain objects to Data Transfer Objects (DTOs).
    EditController
    Controller class responsible for editing user account credentials.
    Farbe
    Represents the suit (color) of a playing card.
    GameBoardController
    Fully functional controller for the GameBoard.
    GameRoomController
    Controller class responsible for managing game room operations.
    GameroomDTO
    Represents a game room on the server side with up to three players.
    GameroomFX
    Represents a JavaFX-compatible model of a game room with bindable player and room name properties.
    GameService
    Service class responsible for managing game state synchronization and polling.
    GameStateDTO
    This class is used to encapsulate and transmit information about the current game state, including player data, which player's turn it is, and whether the game is currently active.
    GameUpdateListener
     
    HeartbeatManager
    Utility class for managing app.client heartbeats to the server.
    JoinController
    Controller for handling user actions related to joining a game room.
    Karte
    Represents a playing card with a suit, rank, and point value.
    KarteAuswerter
     
    LeaderboardEntryDTO
    This class is used to transfer leaderboard data (username and number of wins)
    LobbyController
    Controller class for the lobby view.
    LoginController
    Controller for handling user login and registration navigation.
    PasswordsDoNotMatch
    Exception thrown when the provided passwords do not match during registration.
    PlayerDTO
    A Data Transfer object (DTO) representing a player in the game.
    PlayerModel
    Model class representing a player in thengame.
    Rang
    Represents the rank of a playing card.
    Raumverwaltung
    Remote interface for managing game rooms, including creation, joining, leaving, chat, bots, and room metadata.
    RaumverwaltungImpl
     
    RegisterController
    Controller responsible for user registration UI logic.
    RemoteServiceLocator
    Service locator for accessing remote RMI services.
    SceneSwitching
    Utility class for switching between JavaFX scenes.
    ServerContext
    Central server context managing game state, user sessions, and room data.
    ServerDiscoveryClient
    This class implements a network discovery that allows client locate available servers.
    ServerDiscoveryService
    A UDP-based server discovery service that allows clients to automatically discover the IP address of a running server on the network.
    ServerLauncher
    Main server launcher that initializes all game server components.
    Spiel
    Represents an active card game session within a specific room.
    Spieler
    Represents a player in the game, including their hand, score, and turn status.
    Spielraum
    Represents a game room with players, optional password, chat history, and bots.
    Spielverwaltung
    Remote interface for managing the game lifecycle, player actions, game state, and in-game chat within a game room.
    SpielverwaltungImpl
     
    Stich
    Represents a single trick (Stich) in the card game.
    StichDTO
    This class captures which player played which card in a single round of trick-taking.
    StichModel
    Model class representing a trick (stich) in a card game.
    UseDifferentPassword
    Exception thrown when the new password is the same as the old one.
    UserGamedata
    Class representing user game statistics such as username, games played, and wins.
    UsernameNotAvailable
    Exception thrown when the chosen username is already taken during registration.
    UsernameNotFound
    Exception thrown when a username is not found during login.
    WinController
    This class handles the display of player rankings, scores, and provides navigation back to the game lobby.
    WrongPassword
    Exception thrown when a user enters an incorrect password during login or authentication.
    Zugriffsverwaltung
    Remote interface for managing user access such as registration, login, logout, account editing, and deletion.
    ZugriffsverwaltungImpl
